mapper.select: select id, username as userName, display_name as displayName, user_uuid as uuid, email, phone, gender, password_hash as password, avatar_url as avatar, status, last_login_time as lastLogin, login_count as loginCount, created_at as createTime, updated_at as updateTime, deleted_at as deleteTime, version, remark from pw_user;
mapper.insert: insert into pw_user (username, display_name, user_uuid, email, phone, gender, password_hash, avatar_url, status, last_login_time, login_count, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at, version, remark) values (${userVo.userName}, ${userVo.displayName}, ${userVo.uuid}, ${userVo.email}, ${userVo.phone}, ${userVo.gender}, ${userVo.password}, ${userVo.avatar}, ${userVo.status}, ${userVo.lastLogin}, ${userVo.loginCount}, ${userVo.createTime}, ${userVo.updateTime}, ${userVo.deleteTime}, ${userVo.version}, ${userVo.remark});
